snippet: Saudi Aramco, Saudi Arabia’s national oil company, says a hacker attack last August was limited to office computers and did not hit systems that could affect operations.
abstract: Aramco, Saudi Arabia's national oil company, says debilitating August cyberattack was aimed at stopping oil and gas production in country; attack failed to disrupt production, but was still one of the most destructive hacker strikes against a single business.
lead_paragraph: Saudi Aramco, Saudi Arabia’s national oil company, says a hacker attack last August was limited to office computers and did not hit systems that could affect operations.

headline.seo: Saudi Aramco Says Hackers Took Aim at Its Production
headline.main: Aramco Says Cyberattack Was Aimed at Production
headline.print_headline: Aramco Says Cyberattack Was Aimed At Production
